trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_SEQ_00<tab>Where does the future of fashion lie? Inquiring Loporrits─Managingway among them─wish to know.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the restless Loporrit in the Carrotorium.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested item to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the restless Loporrit in the Carrotorium.

TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_MANAGINGWAY_000_000<tab>This may come as a shock to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but it seems our Ways have developed an insatiable interest in clothing!
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>Is this not a remarkable achievement of individuality? Why, we have always worn identical garb for as long as I can remember.

TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>Yet as we speak, one of our Ways is busy gathering a range of materials with which to make <var 1A 02 /var>fashion<var 1A 01 /var>. I was hoping you might assist them─they asked for you by name, after all. You'll find them in the Carrotorium.

TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_100_010<tab>O-Oh! How wonderful to see you again. D-Do you remember me? I was the one who made you and your friends outfits when you first arrived! Um...I-I've practiced quite a lot since then!
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_100_011<tab>I'm still in the process of gathering supplies, but I thought that maybe...you could craft something for us?
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_200_011<tab>Thank you for your help the other day! Everyone really liked what you made, so maybe...you could craft something for us again?

TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_000_011<tab>I was thinking something shiny and impressive, like a buckle. Buckles are “in,” right? I have these materials to work with. L-Let me know if you need more.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_000_012<tab>I was thinking a “chic” accessory might be nice. Did I use that word right? I have these materials to work with. L-Let me know if you need more.

TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_000_013<tab>I was thinking something glittery that will make the fabric sparkle. Is that hard to do? I have these materials to work with. L-Let me know if you need more.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_000_014<tab>When you're done, I'd like you to go and show Managingway what you made. I'll be thinking up “trendy” new designs, if you need anything.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_000_015<tab>Hi! Did you need something? No? Okay.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_000_016<tab>Hi! Did you need something? No? Okay.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_000_017<tab>Hi! Did you need something? No? Okay.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_000_018<tab>Oh, you've run out of material! It is sort of tricky to twist the thing, isn't it? A-Anyway, here you are.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_000_019<tab>Oh, you've run out of material! Um, I don't really know what “chic” means, so I'll leave it to you, okay? A-Anyway, here you are.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_LOPORRITA04403_000_020<tab>Oh, you've run out of material! No such thing as too glittery, right? A-Anyway, here you are.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_MANAGINGWAY_000_030<tab>How goes the fashion creation?
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_MANAGINGWAY_000_031<tab>My, how daring! I do believe I would enjoy wearing something like this myself.
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_MANAGINGWAY_000_032<tab>I wonder what sort of outfit this will help create. The possibilities seem endless when one stops to consider them.

TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_MANAGINGWAY_000_033<tab>That Way is both hardworking and determined, so I have no doubt their journey upon the road of fashion will be long and fruitful. I do hope you will lend them your expertise again!
TEXT_BANLOP127_04713_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
